resources.string: Unable to save due to invalid input
The expense will be deleted permanently.
Deleting the category will also remove all expenses belonging to it.

We respect your privacy. This app functions entirely offline and does not collect or share any data. This policy applies to all users worldwide, including children of all ages. We do not collect, store, transmit, or share any personal or non-personal information. The app works completely offline. All features can be used without an internet connection, and no data is ever accessed or sent anywhere.
All information you enter into the app is stored only on your own device. It is never uploaded, backed up to external servers, or shared with anyone. We do not and cannot access this information.
The app does not use third-party SDKs, analytics tools, ad networks, or any external services that collect data. No one else, including us, has access to your app usage or data.

You have complete control over the information you enter. You can delete your data at any time by uninstalling the app or clearing its storage. Since nothing is stored externally, no additional steps are required.
The app is safe for all users, including children under the age of 13. No personal data is collected, making it compliant with global child privacy laws such as COPPA and GDPR-K.
As no data is collected, there is nothing for you to access, update, or delete through us. All data is yours and remains solely on your device.
If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, you may contact us by email.
If the app’s functionality changes in a way that affects your privacy, this Privacy Policy will be updated accordingly. We encourage users to review the policy from time to time.

The effective date refers to the day this Privacy Policy was last updated or went into effect. Any changes made to how the app handles your data will be reflected in an updated version of this policy. We encourage users to review this policy periodically to stay informed about how their information is treated.
